website_summaries.verdict: This 21-burger capacity grill is easy to transport and features a durable porcelain coating.
pros: Vent in the lid acts as a temperature control
The hinge acts as a support and will hold the lid open, saving you from doing so manually
cons: The grill section sits too low for some cooking styles

website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that cooks really well, but if you can get by with a smaller grill, the Best Bang grill is probably your better buy.
pros: Gets high marks for how it cooks
Assembles easily and holds up well over time
The shape allows for the use of less charcoal
cons: Lid rack is weak and can’t hold a lot of weight
Assembly directions leave a bit to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Quality grill at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill! The grill is a breeze to put together, made with quality parts and cooks beautifully. The lid is hinged and has a built in rack which is a major plus. Be careful with the lid rack though it is a little weaker and will start to sag a little if you put some weight on it. It worked great for veggies, but when I put about 2lbs of meat on it to add some more wood chips the rack did say some. All in all you couldn't ask for a better grill for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L Bartenfeld III

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! My old big Kingsford grill that I took great care of finally gave away with rusting after 10 years. As I have been looking to downsize and wanted something smaller.I am happy with my purchase of this Kingsford barbecue kettle charcoal grill. For one person putting this together takes maybe 45mins to 1 hour. The directions are very simple and very easy to read. I believe this grill is sturdy and well made and it is very easy to clean. I hope this will last me a long time with great care. Time will tell though. Love my Kingsford grill!
customer_reviews.author: ChiChi

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is a medium quality grill! It was just a little bit difficult to install but the finished product is well worth it :) the grill is also a little on the short side i feel that it should be a little bit taller but other than that my dad loved his new grill! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Torres

customer_reviews.title: ) It works just as well as our old Weber and I like that it has the ash bin at the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend assembled this alone in an hour and a half without any difficulty (and he's not very handy so that saying a lot!) It works just as well as our old Weber and I like that it has the ash bin at the bottom for easy disposal. Just as good as other grills for a fraction of the price. I'm keep it covered now and hope it lasts a few seasons like the other reviews stated. Tried it out over Labor Day and smoked a brisket to perfection. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: This grill was easy to put together and seems good and sturdy. I am well pleased with this purchase. I love the hinged lid and the ash bowl feature. Should make for easy clean up. Grilled some good Ole Wisconsin brats and they turned out delishous! Well worth the $. Been looking in stores but they go for over $100 and the lids aren't hinged like this one! Love that feature! Nothing like a good Ole charcoal barbie!]
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: good product but came with chipped porselain and dented bowl
customer_reviews.text: the product shipped on time and I was able to assemble it fairly easily. Everything works good. The problem is that the product porcelain coating came chipped and the bowl came slightly dented. shame on me for not returning this but if you read more of the reviews you will see this is a fairly common problem and the manufacturer or shipper clearly needs to improve their quality control for packaging.
customer_reviews.author: jlkmj2

customer_reviews.title: Works great! First time buying a Kingsford grill and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! First time buying a Kingsford grill and we were impressed buy how perfect our chicken turned out. Best grill for the price that we have owned
customer_reviews.author: J. Sudac

customer_reviews.title: Love that you can empty the charcoal dust but disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can empty the charcoal dust but disappointed that you can't move the grill plate up and down as it seems to be to far from the coals so it takes longer to cook. Seems the coals go out before the food is done.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations; easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Despite several reviews that indicated the assembly was difficult, I had no problem with it. Attaching the top cover to the bottom bowl is easier with 2 people. I tried by myself but asked a friend to help. I could have done it, but would have taken a bit longer. Everything else fit together near perfectly. Cooks the way you want a grill to cook. Great for a smaller grill.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: A great griller!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been looking for an old fashioned grill for awhile - thinking that Weber was the way to go. But this Kingsford is every bit as good (maybe better) and at a much more reasonable price. My husband loves it -- and of course so do I because he's doing the cooking! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kingsfords BBQ Outdoor is the best Grill
customer_reviews.text: Best barbecue pit ever! I would highly recommend this to anybody who loves to cook
customer_reviews.author: manuel sanchez

customer_reviews.title: allowing you to add coals like the weber one
customer_reviews.text: Spacious upgrade from Weber grill, only gripe, the grill grate does lift open on the side, allowing you to add coals like the weber one. Add this feature and this is 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Hos

customer_reviews.title: I had to put it together but it wasn't that difficult and it was pretty quick. My husband has yet to touch it ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought the grill for my husband's birthday. I had to put it together but it wasn't that difficult and it was pretty quick. My husband has yet to touch it but I grill on it every nice weekend. Last night I made venison steak, grilled whole potatoes, turkey burgers, ballpark hotdogs. it all turned out delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: A real cheap design. The ash catcher falls off whenever you try and move the BBQ. I've already broken the handle because it kept falling off. Also, the warming rack does not stay in it's holes whenever you open and close the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected does a great job looks like it's going to hold up much better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Donna Whites

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Bbq
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s really nice and it’s big enough for me. I live the shelf above the charcoal
customer_reviews.author: Lakseha Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is very nice the only reason Igave it 4 stars is the legs are short so the grill doesn’t set as high as I would like
customer_reviews.author: kcrl

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Did anyone else have problems assembling it? The lid does not seem to line up with the bottom part to be able to line up the holes for the screws. We can’t get the lid on and it seems defective. I contacted the seller and am waiting a reply to get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good Kingsford charcoal grill.
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. Cooks much better than the old aluminum square one I used forever. I have been using it about 1 year now. It cooks everything really good and even. I really like the air adjustments to regulate the heat and how it catches the ashes in the bottom. The finish is really durable. I put cooking oil on the inside before the first use as directed. It has even been rained on a few times and no rust whatsoever. The way this is holding up I will probably never have to buy another grill.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it. saved $$$ by not buying the "name-brand" kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jane Felstein

customer_reviews.title: Sister did it.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, works great. Easy to assemble. I gave it for a Fathers Day gift and he loved it. <I made my sister put it together> lol
customer_reviews.author: sandyloo

customer_reviews.title: ... a little more than I expected but overall very good
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was a little more than I expected but overall very good
customer_reviews.author: chris yuill

customer_reviews.title: This grill works really well for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with this grill. He has been grilling ike crazy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Put together easily. Solid. Cooked steaks and ribs so far. Works great! Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Kingsford OGD2001901-KF Outdoor Charcoal Kettle Grill, 22.5-Inch
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased, and happy with how well the grill cooks. It is a well made grill, and also the price was reasonable. I would definitely buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JodieCaplette

customer_reviews.title: other than the dents and chipped paint, it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Came dented and chipped paint. Unfortunately we had to make do with it because it arrived only the day before a big birthday party and we needed to grill the food.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby J DeLaRosby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Perfect for our little family. Was easy to put together and get grilling!
customer_reviews.author: JMaynP

customer_reviews.title: Product works, no thanks to seller!
customer_reviews.text: Good news: looks to be fairly stable, pretty big cooking area, easy to put together. Bad news: came pretty beat up. Thank God it was easy to put together because no directions came with it. The box looked like it was a return, which I hope isn't the case since I paid new price for it. All in all, will not buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allen Cullison

customer_reviews.title: Overall the grill looks fantastic and pretty big
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a 3 star because once received I noticed there were some damages to the grill. Damaged to the top and inside of the grill. Overall the grill looks fantastic and pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it and the lid has welding marks that wasn't painted.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Valenza

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son who loves to barbecue,100%happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: iris swanson

customer_reviews.title: it was extremely easy to put together and works great easy to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: it was extremely easy to put together and works great easy to clean and easy to use great space for plenty of food wonderful price to for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill, Can't Attach Lid
customer_reviews.text: All in all, its a good grill, but the lid wont attach to the hardware. Will have to use lid manually.
customer_reviews.author: B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together took only 45 minutes. Be nice if rack was adjustable so you could raise it up you to do a lot of flipping so your food does not burn. All in all a decent grill for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Grill
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son and daughter-in-law as a gift. The size is perfect for a family of 4 and has room to cook for company as well. The shape of the grill is better than a Weber, because it does not require as much charcoal and it has an easier venting system. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kutz

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This Kingsford grill has definitely met my expectations. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Get a weber
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill, a pain to put together. Things may be mislabeled for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: michael hale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to take camping, tailgating and it's made by Kingsford
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: I went back to a charcoal grill after years on a gas grill and this is a perfect grill for my heeds. It was easy to assemble and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and works like any other! A great price for a charcoal BBQ
customer_reviews.author: RoseEve

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: after putting it together, it still is a little shaky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I Love It
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time. All the pieces were there. Works great! I Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: sanjay

customer_reviews.title: I like this grill
customer_reviews.text: I like this grill! Instructions weren't exactly the clearest. Just make sure you put the legs on so the holes line up to attach the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill and my dad loves it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for Father's Day! Great grill and my dad loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It's nice now but the ash pan slips out of place ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a bitch to put together. I had to have a male friend help - and he's a maintenance worker - and we ended up re-doing things with the legs and lid at least twice. Putting the hinge for the lid on was VERY difficult. It took us a couple of hours. It's nice now but the ash pan slips out of place when moving the unit and the bread rack inside has fallen out each time I've tried to use it. It is a good height and overall seems sturdy however.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's Great I've Used It 4 Times Since I Purchased It.
customer_reviews.author: Harold a marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great basic grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and just a great basic grill. I use it weekly!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great grill. Not very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Not very difficult to assemble. I grill occasionally during the summer months and this grill more than meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Les Coble

customer_reviews.title: Its seems to be a nice grill but when we opened it to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Its seems to be a nice grill but when we opened it to put it together it was missing the 2 handles one to open and the other to pull the grill.
customer_reviews.author: mary sellers

customer_reviews.title: Love my charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Have used it plenty of times. Love my charcoal grill
customer_reviews.author: 1 VA Shake

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good BBQ. It works well for up to 4 people.The lid for the BBQ came with a dent in it that makes it hard to close it all the way. It is frustrating that they sent a damaged lid to us.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for small grilling just for 2. It was a little hard to assemble..
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: price was good, and very easy to put together. Instructions written well
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lodermeier

customer_reviews.title: does not get enough air into the chamber. Also ...
customer_reviews.text: does not get enough air into the chamber. Also the bottom grill that hold the charcoal sits too loose - if you are using a chimney to start the coals the bottom grate will shift when releasing the coals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Kinneary

customer_reviews.title: Cooking with charcoal ++++
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been terrific. The cooking space is just the right size for our needs. I will take charcoal over gas gas any day.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice grill - love the hinged top - put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grill - love the hinged top - put it together in about 30 minutes with a philips head screwdriver and a pair of channel locks. Was cooking on it the same day. amazing value - can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman

customer_reviews.title: Kingford 22.5 Grill
customer_reviews.text: My other grill is small, needed a bigger one. This one fits the bill. Thanks. Now need a cover for my KF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a grill that would work well on my small/medium sized deck, but that would still provide a good amount of cooking area. This grill arrived in 2 days with my Prime membership. It took about 45 minutes to put together (if you are at ALL handy, it won't take that long) and all I used was a screwdriver. I cooked on it the same night I finished putting it together. I was able to fit 2 chicken breasts, asparagus, zucchini, and potatoes on the grill at once (more if I had also used the warming rack). Overall, it's a very nice grill for the price and I'm happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: CH17

customer_reviews.title: Love the hinged lid
customer_reviews.text: Husband says only problem he has with it is uneven heat...he is experimenting with the vents and hopefully he'll get the knack for getting even heat across the rack. Love the hinged lid!
customer_reviews.author: MrsPapaG2002

customer_reviews.title: This is simply an inferior product, from the thinness ...
customer_reviews.text: This is simply an inferior product, from the thinness of the sheet metal to the tinny washers and screws used to hold it together to a paint-job which will quickly blister. Unfortunately, this is a product not built to last and I will be returning it. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Messecar

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: I chose this grill because of the warming rack and price could not find one locally.The previous grill I had lasted for years and cooked great but could not find another the competitor stopped carrying the grill.I cook a lot of Boston butts on the warming rack to make BBQ.I cook the boston butts at least six hours and they taste great
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Simple Device
customer_reviews.text: Height of grate is static - no way to adjust distance from the coals.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: broke the first use
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking grill, but handle on grill broke the first time we used it - still waiting for reply from Kingsford about replacing it
customer_reviews.author: amazon byer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Very nice charcoal grill! Nice height and price. Would definately recommend this grill to others to buy. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vonderhaar

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, makes for a nice hot fire and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality,makes for a nice hot fire and my BBQ has been tasty..
customer_reviews.author: Leisa  in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: grill
customer_reviews.text: the grill works fine but the lid came with a dent in it and paint was chipped off that area. It was not something that I would have sent back for but I would not have bought it at the store that way.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This grill works great. Only the test of time will tell how many summers it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have not yet used this grill, it just arrived yesterday and I have just finished assembling it. As I began the assembly, I noticed that the bottom of the grill was bent pretty significantly in several areas. Because I was desperate for a grill, I kept it and bent it back with a pair of pliers. It isn't totally normal but functional, which is a bit disappointing for a brand new purchase. It is a good sized grill and looks like it will be just what I needed, just disappointed with the poor packaging. I have left this feedback with Amazon, hopefully they will take note and make some changes to how the grill is packaged and shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good grill, however
customer_reviews.text: This is a good grill, however, when i opened the box the wheel was chipped and the lid had a pretty good size dent in it. Not necessarily a product issue, probably just mishandled during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Costa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and condition
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented and paint was peeling. Very thin metal and light weight. I did an exchange and the replacement showed up with scratches, dents and smudged paint. Even if it arrived in descent condition I still wouldn't recommend anyone to get this. Everything piece on it was cheaply made. Spend a little extra and get a webber. Or if you want something even nicer get the Char-Broil Kettleman. I have had all three of these now and the Kettleman is probably the nicest.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: there was nothing wrong with the grill I return it ...
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing wrong with the grill I return it because i found the exact same one for half of the amazon price
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R Smith

customer_reviews.title: It will rust
customer_reviews.text: It works for a beginner but the grill rusted after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Enghusen

customer_reviews.title: One important engineering FLAW
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 Weber grills (expensive ~ poor ash control) , 2 super fine Happy Cookers (out of production), a worthless Charbroil, a Charcoal Pro (not bad but lightweight) & now this one. The rack that holds the coals skids all over, tilts as the coals are arranged, and is too close to the cooking surface. This is a real pain! The construction is more heavy duty than the last two I've owned
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Boersma

customer_reviews.title: We're marginally disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating to put together due to unclear directions. Came banged up; scratched, dented, bent on the lip. We're marginally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Policies apparently prohibit me telling the truth about this experience. The grill works though.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great grill; worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is just what we were looking for. Putting it together was a little harder than expected. The big parts were not labeled "front" or "back", "left" or "right", so it was a figure it out and hope for the best assembly project! I had to re-assemble the lid so I felt lucky. The grill cooks great and we love it. I would recommend it to anyone who can also figure out the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Susan’s Reads

customer_reviews.title: Beware of shipper
customer_reviews.text: The grill is great for the price but like some of the other posts, it was slightly damaged upon arrival. There were two 4in long creases in the lid, so what ever hit it hit it very hard making the lid not fit tight to the bottom. Other than that it is still a good grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this grill, very cheap and unstable...had to buy the webber.
customer_reviews.author: ADP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill for the cost. I hope you get Ebola if you don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Big Papi

customer_reviews.title: i ordered the grill because of the name Kingsford. ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the grill because of the name Kingsford. i put it together in a half a hour without problems. i made a mistake picking kingsford ,dad always told me when you buy cheap you get cheap.! i should had listened to that advise
customer_reviews.author: ed strigle

product_meta.title: Kingsford OGD2001901-KF Charcoal Kettle Grill, 22.5", Black
product_meta.description: Kingsford, 22. 5", Charcoal Kettle Grill, Hinged Lid, Ash Catcher, Condiment/Tool Basket, Porcelain Coated Steel Fire Bowl, Primary Cooking Area Of 363 SQIN, Warming Rack Cooking Area Of 162 SQIN, Chrome Plated Steel Main Grilling Grate, Chrome Plated Steel Warming Rack.
feature_bullets: Bottom Rack for Extra Storage, Wheels for Easy Transportation
Air Vent for Better Temperature Control
